{COLOR}WARNING{RESET}: Malbench is a tool for testing antivirus software against real-world malware samples. While it does not contain any malware on its own, it is designed to run malware samples provided by the user. Use Malbench only in secure and isolated environments that you are authorized in doing so. Do NOT use Malbench on a computer or network that contains sensitive information or data that you are not willing to lose and/or become compromised. By using Malbench, you acknowledge the risks and assume full responsibility for any damages that may result.
